org.apache.http.impl.auth

类 GGSSchemeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.auth.AuthSchemeBase
      • org.apache.http.impl.auth.GGSSchemeBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AuthScheme, ContextAwareAuthScheme
    直接已知子类:
    KerberosScheme, NegotiateScheme, SPNegoScheme

    @NotThreadSafe
public abstract class GGSSchemeBase
extends AuthSchemeBase
    从以下版本开始:
    4.2

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        从接口复制的说明: AuthScheme
        Authentication process may involve a series of challenge-response exchanges. This method tests if the authorization process has been completed, either successfully or unsuccessfully, that is, all the required authorization challenges have been processed in their entirety.
        返回:
        true if the authentication process has been completed, false otherwise.

      • authenticate

        @Deprecated
public Header authenticate(Credentials credentials,
                                        HttpRequest request)
                                 throws AuthenticationException
        已过时。 (4.2) Use ContextAwareAuthScheme.authenticate( Credentials, HttpRequest, org.apache.http.protocol.HttpContext)
        从接口复制的说明: AuthScheme
        Produces an authorization string for the given set of Credentials.
        参数:
        credentials - The set of credentials to be used for athentication
        request - The request being authenticated
        返回:
        the authorization string
        抛出:
        AuthenticationException - if authorization string cannot be generated due to an authentication failure

      • authenticate

        public Header authenticate(Credentials credentials,
                           HttpRequest request,
                           HttpContext context)
                    throws AuthenticationException
        从接口复制的说明: ContextAwareAuthScheme
        Produces an authorization string for the given set of Credentials.
        指定者:
        authenticate 在接口中 ContextAwareAuthScheme
        覆盖:
        authenticate 在类中 AuthSchemeBase
        参数:
        credentials - The set of credentials to be used for athentication
        request - The request being authenticated
        context - HTTP context
        返回:
        the authorization string
        抛出:
        AuthenticationException - if authorization string cannot be generated due to an authentication failure
